remarks: Comparison of the limits of two sequences.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 10-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Feb-2014.)
statement:
climadd.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climadd.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climadd.4 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climle.5 $e |- ( ph -> G ~~> B ) $.
climle.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
climle.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. RR ) $.
climle.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) <_ ( G ` k ) ) $.
climle $p |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
